title: Speaker of the House of Commons (Canada)
summary: The Speaker of the House of Commons (French: pr√©sident de la Chambre des communes) is the presiding officer of the lower house of the Parliament of Canada. A Member of Parliament (MP), they are elected at the beginning of each new parliament by fellow MPs. The speaker's role in presiding over Canada's House of Commons is similar to that of speakers elsewhere in other countries that use the Westminster system.
